data.content: my relationship has been the best thing that has ever happened in my life. Even though he is just a butterfly he represents my life as a whole. I want to be like him, I wanted to fly away from the problems of life and land gracefully whenever i want

It sounds like the butterfly in your relationship represents a sense of freedom and escape for you. Can you tell me more about what problems in life you are trying to escape from? Are there any other ways you are currently coping with these challenges in your life?
